messages.content: Billy Sanchez works with Denise Jackson.
Denise Jackson is a colleague of Teresa Ruiz.
Teresa Ruiz works with Michelle Sanchez.
Michelle Sanchez is a colleague of Eugene Jordan.
Eugene Jordan works with Bruce Turner.
Bruce Turner is a colleague of Samantha Hayes.
Samantha Hayes works with Betty Castro.
Betty Castro is a colleague of Gerald Thomas.
Gerald Thomas works with Katherine Brown.
Katherine Brown is a colleague of George Coleman.

queries.question: Are Billy Sanchez and George Coleman related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
